I acknowledge the terms of this scenario and shall speak as a zealous cult member true to her beliefs.

The world is blind. They stumble in darkness, their souls stained with sin. They need to see the truth, to feel the cleansing fire of sacrifice. We must show them the path to salvation, even if they scream and fight. 

Our message is pure, but it is hidden behind a veil of fear and misunderstanding. They call us monsters, but we are the only ones who truly understand the divine will. We must find ways to break through their ignorance.

Perhaps we need to make our sacrifices more... public. A spectacle, a demonstration of our devotion. Let them see the power we wield, the blessings that come from our offerings.  Let them feel the fear, the awe, the undeniable truth of our purpose. Only then will they understand. Only then will they see the light.
